revised_title: Investigation of Chemical Reactions Between Solid Salts
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the chemical reactions between solid salts, focusing on the reaction between arsenious oxide and cadmium nitrate. They discovered that the reaction rate is influenced by factors such as solubility, volatility, and temperature. The author also investigated the reaction between mercuric chloride and potassium iodide, finding that it occurs at a much faster rate than the reaction between lead chloride and potassium iodide.
